Mac.title: Copy and paste in Excel
Mac.description: Use Command+C to copy and Command+V to paste in Excel.

Mac.title: Undo in Excel
Mac.description: Use Command+Z to undo the last action in Excel.

Mac.title: Save in Excel
Mac.description: Use Command+S to save your work in Excel.

Mac.title: Bold text in Excel
Mac.description: Use Command+B to bold selected text in Excel.

Mac.title: Italicize text in Excel
Mac.description: Use Command+I to italicize selected text in Excel.

Mac.title: Underline text in Excel
Mac.description: Use Command+U to underline selected text in Excel.

Mac.title: Insert a new worksheet in Excel
Mac.description: Use Command+Option+F11 to insert a new worksheet in Excel.

Mac.title: Go to a specific cell in Excel
Mac.description: Use Command+G and enter the cell reference to go to a specific cell in Excel.

Mac.title: Insert current date in Excel
Mac.description: Use Command+; (semicolon) to insert the current date in Excel.

Mac.title: Insert current time in Excel
Mac.description: Use Command+Shift+; (semicolon) to insert the current time in Excel.

Mac.title: Copy and paste in Excel
Mac.description: Use Command+C to copy and Command+V to paste in Excel.

Mac.title: Undo in Excel
Mac.description: Use Command+Z to undo the last action in Excel.

Mac.title: Save in Excel
Mac.description: Use Command+S to save your work in Excel.

Mac.title: Bold text in Excel
Mac.description: Use Command+B to bold selected text in Excel.

Mac.title: Italicize text in Excel
Mac.description: Use Command+I to italicize selected text in Excel.

Mac.title: Underline text in Excel
Mac.description: Use Command+U to underline selected text in Excel.

Mac.title: Insert a new worksheet in Excel
Mac.description: Use Command+Option+F11 to insert a new worksheet in Excel.

Mac.title: Go to a specific cell in Excel
Mac.description: Use Command+G and enter the cell reference to go to a specific cell in Excel.

Mac.title: Insert current date in Excel
Mac.description: Use Command+; (semicolon) to insert the current date in Excel.

Mac.title: Insert current time in Excel
Mac.description: Use Command+Shift+; (semicolon) to insert the current time in Excel.

Mac.title: Insert a hyperlink in Excel
Mac.description: Use Command+K to insert a hyperlink in Excel.

Mac.title: Toggle wrap text in Excel
Mac.description: Use Command+Option+W to toggle wrap text in Excel.

Mac.title: Merge cells in Excel
Mac.description: Use Command+Option+M to merge cells in Excel.

Mac.title: Unmerge cells in Excel
Mac.description: Use Command+Option+U to unmerge cells in Excel.

Mac.title: Toggle formula view in Excel
Mac.description: Use Command+Tilde (`) to toggle between formula view and value view in Excel.

Mac.title: Format cells in Excel
Mac.description: Use Command+1 to open the Format Cells dialog box in Excel.

Mac.title: Conditional formatting in Excel
Mac.description: Use Command+Shift+L to apply or remove a filter in Excel.

Mac.title: Data validation in Excel
Mac.description: Use Command+Shift+A to open the Data Validation dialog box in Excel.

Mac.title: Toggle gridlines in Excel
Mac.description: Use Command+Asterisk (*) to toggle gridlines in Excel.

Mac.title: Toggle full screen in Excel
Mac.description: Use Command+Shift+Enter to toggle full screen in Excel.

Windows.title: Copy and paste in Excel
Windows.description: Use Ctrl+C to copy and Ctrl+V to paste in Excel.

Windows.title: Undo in Excel
Windows.description: Use Ctrl+Z to undo the last action in Excel.

Windows.title: Save in Excel
Windows.description: Use Ctrl+S to save your work in Excel.

Windows.title: Bold text in Excel
Windows.description: Use Ctrl+B to bold selected text in Excel.

Windows.title: Italicize text in Excel
Windows.description: Use Ctrl+I to italicize selected text in Excel.

Windows.title: Underline text in Excel
Windows.description: Use Ctrl+U to underline selected text in Excel.

Windows.title: Insert a new worksheet in Excel
Windows.description: Use Ctrl+Shift+F11 to insert a new worksheet in Excel.

Windows.title: Go to a specific cell in Excel
Windows.description: Use F5 and enter the cell reference to go to a specific cell in Excel.

Windows.title: Insert current date in Excel
Windows.description: Use Ctrl+; (semicolon) to insert the current date in Excel.

Windows.title: Insert current time in Excel
Windows.description: Use Ctrl+Shift+; (semicolon) to insert the current time in Excel.

Windows.title: Insert a new row in Excel
Windows.description: Use Ctrl+Shift+plus sign (+) to insert a new row in Excel.

Windows.title: Insert a new column in Excel
Windows.description: Use Ctrl+Shift+plus sign (+) while in a row number to insert a new column in Excel.

Windows.title: Delete a row in Excel
Windows.description: Use Ctrl+minus sign (-) to delete a row in Excel.

Windows.title: Delete a column in Excel
Windows.description: Use Ctrl+minus sign (-) while in a row number to delete a column in Excel.

Windows.title: Autofill in Excel
Windows.description: Use the fill handle (a small square in the lower-right corner of a selected cell) to autofill data in Excel.

Windows.title: AutoSum in Excel
Windows.description: Use Alt+= (equal sign) to insert an AutoSum formula in Excel.

Windows.title: Toggle absolute and relative references in Excel
Windows.description: Use F4 to toggle between absolute and relative references in Excel formulas.

Windows.title: Find in Excel
Windows.description: Use Ctrl+F to open the Find function in Excel.

Windows.title: Replace in Excel
Windows.description: Use Ctrl+H to open the Replace function in Excel.

Windows.title: Insert a comment in Excel
Windows.description: Use Shift+F2 to insert a comment in Excel.

Windows.title: Insert a hyperlink in Excel
Windows.description: Use Ctrl+K to insert a hyperlink in Excel.

Windows.title: Toggle wrap text in Excel
Windows.description: Use Ctrl+Shift+W to toggle wrap text in Excel.

Windows.title: Merge cells in Excel
Windows.description: Use Ctrl+Shift+M to merge cells in Excel.

Windows.title: Unmerge cells in Excel
Windows.description: Use Ctrl+Shift+U to unmerge cells in Excel.

Windows.title: Toggle formula view in Excel
Windows.description: Use Ctrl+` (grave accent) to toggle between formula view and value view in Excel.

Windows.title: Format cells in Excel
Windows.description: Use Ctrl+1 to open the Format Cells dialog box in Excel.

Windows.title: Conditional formatting in Excel
Windows.description: Use Ctrl+Shift+L to apply or remove a filter in Excel.

Windows.title: Data validation in Excel
Windows.description: Use Ctrl+Shift+A to open the Data Validation dialog box in Excel.

Windows.title: Toggle gridlines in Excel
Windows.description: Use Ctrl+* (asterisk) to toggle gridlines in Excel.

Windows.title: Toggle full screen in Excel
Windows.description: Use Alt+Shift+Enter to toggle full screen in Excel.
